meanings.definition: Polite and refined in behavior or speech.
meanings.sent1: She was the courtliest lady at the party, always saying please and thank you.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman's courtliest manners impressed everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: The courtliest penguin in the colony always held the door open for others.
meanings.sent4: Her courtliest smile could brighten even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The courtliest handshake he offered showed his genuine kindness.

meanings.definition: Showing the manners and behavior expected of a royal court.
meanings.sent1: The queen's courtliest attendants were always ready to assist her.
meanings.sent2: The courtliest ballroom dance captured the essence of royal elegance.
meanings.sent3: The courtliest squirrel in the park demanded only the finest acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the courtliest gown at the royal banquet.
meanings.sent5: The courtliest bow he performed was fit for a king.

meanings.sent1: The garden party was filled with the courtliest decorations and flowers.
meanings.sent2: The courtliest music played softly in the background of the elegant event.
meanings.sent3: The courtliest swan on the lake glided gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent4: Her courtliest hat was the talk of the town for its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The courtliest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.
